message: All metadata fields for the indicator 12-5-3, translated into en
data: Objective 12. Establish sustainable consumption and production patterns12.5 By 2030, significantly reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse12.5.3. Percentage of cities with more than 25,000 inhabitants that have an adequate disposal site5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMMinistry of Transport, Public Works, Equipment and Land Use Planning (MTTPEAT)Mr KIGABO Marijani SAIDIStatistical serviceFocal point for the production of the Ministry's SDGs75779201marisaidi212@gmail.comThis is the percentage of cities with more than 25,000 inhabitants with an adequate disposal site compared to all cities with more than 25,000 inhabitantsPercentageMTTPEAT annual reportsAdministrative dataAnnualannualMTTPATMTTPATComponent of the SSN with a mandate to collect, compile and disseminate sector dataThe indicator is relevant because it reflects the level of environmental protectionThis is the percentage of cities with more than 25,000 inhabitants with an adequate disposal site compared to all cities with more than 25,000 inhabitantsannualAvailable nationallyThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelMTTEAT annual report
